website_summaries.verdict: Offers lots of fun features and a great way for kids to indulge in action play in versatile rescue vehicle.
pros: A well-made toy packed with fascinating details and movable parts that stimulate the imagination
Comes with Ryder and his rescue ATV
Has lights and sounds that kids love

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOY EVER !
customer_reviews.text: the size of this toy is amazing, very well built and so much fun playing with it. My son was just amazed like I was when I first saw it.One of the best toy in the market, honestly!!! and it was delivered in a full size box...this toy is really big
customer_reviews.author: LUCIAN

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol on a Roll!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vehicle. My 3 year old loves it! Sturdy. Transforms from Land to Sea ship easily (just slide the front). It rolls nicely also. The moving crane is a delight for my 3 year old. Comes with Ryder and the octopus that is featured in the new Sea Patrol episodes o that was a plus. You can fit 2 of the Sea Patrol vehicles in the ship at once. The back opens as a ramp and the "roll out" just like on tv. If your child doesn't already have one sea Patrol vehicle/character then you may want to purchase one to go along with this Sea Patroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound didnt work. It takes one of those small ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound didnt work. It takes one of those small batteries so I thought that the battery was just worn out. I bought new ones and replaced it, but it still doesn’t work unless you push down on the battery compartment lid the whole time. It shorts out. My son still plays with it but, for the price, all of the features should work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of things for kids to play with
customer_reviews.text: My son loves paw patrol and he wanted a toy. So I bought him this and he loved it. It comes with a lot of things to do and a lot of accessories. I would recommend for anyone who has a kid that likes paw patrol.
customer_reviews.author: kirstd@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: At first I didnt want to buy this. I ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didnt want to buy this. I thought it was way 2 expensive. I am the type of person to buy toys at yard sales. I dont understand paying full price for a toy. Well my son really wanted this for Xmas and I pulled the trigger. The boat is HUGE. The picture does not do justice. My son LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Fhockey28

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gift
customer_reviews.text: Of all the gifts my 2 two year grandsons received for Christmas, the Paw Patrol gifts were their favorites, in two different households. One grandchild played with it all day the other all evening after he opened the gift. It seems to be very durable. The other set of grandparents gave one the children the Pirate Paw Patrol set and between the two he was busy all day. They each played by themselves happily using all sorts of imagination and later with the adults involvement. So much fun to see the boys having such a great time with a nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with scuffs, even with appropriate packaging
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to love this, which is why I was willing to fork up the amount of money being charged now that this is no longer available. However, the toy came scuffed up which is pretty disappointing when you spend 100 dollars on a toy. Either way, at least it didn’t arrive broken and is still in working order. I’m sure my 3 year old will add to the scuffs and she will still really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Krw

customer_reviews.title: Sinks Like A Rock
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool looking toy, but please realize it only comes with Ryder and his vehicle. The lights and sound works, for now anyway, but we had a problem. It doesn’t float. So if you think your child can play with it while it floats around-it doesn’t. Sinks like a rock. So no pool play. We also are struggling with getting the wheels to come out to transform it into a land vehicle. Tells how to retract the wheels, but not how to get them to come out. Very large and flashy and my grandson likes it, but has some drawbacks you need to know about before spending that much money.
customer_reviews.author: Karla K.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this 10 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this is an award winning toy. Its easily one of the best things I bought for my 4 year old grandson who lives for Paw Patrol at the moment. Its a very well designed toy. Between this and the big Paw Patrol Rescue and Transport Vehicle (together with all his smaller vehicles and characters), he will literally play non stop in his bedroom until he is made to come out for meals and baths, lol. He never grows tired of them and I love to eavesdrop on all the missions he conjures up in his imagination while playing with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great discount but inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: Excellent discounted price. Just wish the description would have been more specific... It said "used like new" when it was actually brand new never opened but had minor damage. The damage did not effect the functionality at all as it was a small stress mark and crack in plastic hull and the ring on the rear of the boat where you can hook the anchor on was snapped off. Nothing super glue didn't fix. Still for the HUGE savings I have no regrets and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kaloczi

customer_reviews.title: Paid for happiness
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. My 5 year old grandson has been asking for this for his birthday for the past 6 months and I promised I would get it for him. Unbeknownst to me, this item is no longer made and a $40 toy ended up costing me $114. While I’m a bit upset having to pay this, I realize it may not have been available at all otherwise. So I look at it as paying for his happiness and that’s most important. Note to self, next time I will buy it off the shelf as soon as it’s asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 2.5 year old and he loved it he yelled COOL!!!! And then gave ran over and gave me a hug and a kiss, he was pumped, he has played with it non stop since we unboxed it. Even my 9 year old I have noticed has been playing with it a lot as well. Everything works great and it came in good condition. Beware it is a good sized toy. It also seems very sturdy. It also doesn't go in the water. That would be the only thing that would make it better
customer_reviews.author: BIG T

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy that is something different.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for and paw patrol loving child. My four year old grandson absolutely loved this. It's nice and big with room for lots of characters. There are movable pieces that lend themselves to creating many scenarios with the huge boat and paw patrol characters. This was a big hit with my grandson as well as his three brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: For Paw Patrol Fans
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted this toy and have been asking for it. We finally bought it but he played with it for 2 weeks and that's it. While the toy says it is for 3 years old and up, my 3 year old boy was more into lego and building blocks. So if you're considering buying this, maybe more suitable when your kid is at a younger age or when they are very into vehicles (non-RC type)
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Includes cute figures!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 2 year old boy who loves Paw Patrol. I like that this includes the little boy figure, Ruser, as well as a little octopus figure. The octopus is very cute and cool looking. My child already has most of the paw patrol figures and vehicles sets, so he uses those when playing with this boat.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'ama

customer_reviews.title: Aunty of the year for buying this won!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for Christmas. Let’s just say I won Aunty of the Year! This toy was way bigger than I had expected. It was the biggest wrapped gift under the tree second to my Ninja Foodi (to give some perspective on the size of the box). This was the best price anywhere! Target had it listed for twice as much and on sale and the shelf was empty - I feel bad for everyone who paid that much!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale for 30
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. The first one i bought, the boat did2nt make any noises, but we moved across the country and only brought bags onto a plane with clothes and some toys so i had to get rid of the first one i bought and buy a new one! He still loves it just as much and i would recommend it for anyone that loves paw patrol. This one had sound and i never realized that it was supposed to make a noise until this one lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our son’s birthday and he loooves it!!! Kids can enjoy it especially, if they already have the pups with the vehicles! Our son keeps the vehicles in the sea patroller so now it’s much easier for him to put his toys away!!! That was a great bonus for him and us, the parents!!! The price was great too! Thanks, amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: ami h

customer_reviews.title: Worked for three days.
customer_reviews.text: This was my son’s big 4th birthday present and he lost his mind with excitement when he got it. Then about three days later the wheels stopped retracting on one side. He didn’t drop it or anything, it just stopped clicking into place on one side. So now he can only use it with the wheels out or sitting lopsided. Which is a bummer since the transformation from boat to vehicle was kind of the cool trick to the whole thing. He still loves it but gets frustrated every time he uses it. And of course it worked just long enough for us to pitch the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Horn

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment is broken
customer_reviews.text: Using pill batteries for a kid toy like this is a terrible choice, they're going to run out immediately. Ours was broken on arrival. The battery compartment doesn't press the batteries down enough so it doesn't work unless you hold the batteries down with your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME toy! It's very big and it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME toy! It's very big and it comes with all kinds of great stuff. Buoys, a hook, an octopus, water Ryder, an anchor etc. It can be a boat or roll on land. Great noise and lights. Room for a bunch of pups and about 3 vehicles. This was a big hit at our house and it was reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Busick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Realistic, Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My children (6 and 2) received this as a Christmas gift. They both really enjoy playing with it! They enjoy putting their Sea Patrol vehicles (purchased separately) inside and having pretend "rescue missions." The sounds and voices are very realistic. The materials used to make this are rather sturdy compared to most children's toys today, and I feel that it will last my children quite a while despite their tendency to play rough from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my three year old son for Christmas. He is completely obsessed with Paw Patrol. I thought he would like this a lot more than he does. He was happy with it, but not estatic. The sounds are pretty annoying. One is supposed to sound like seagulls? I don’t know. It is loud and screachy. Headache material. Overall, it is a fun addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sound not working
customer_reviews.text: Sound didnt work. It takes one of those small batteries so I thought that the battery was just worn out. I bought new ones and replaced it, but it still doesn’t work. My son still plays with it but, for the price, all of the features should work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawsy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this products. My three-year-old loves paw patrol and this was one of the only toys he didn’t have so Amazon had it and I snagged it!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Good large size toy
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be 5 grandson saw this in the bookstore & it’s all he could talk about. He loves the paw patrol toys and his mom said I could get this for him for his 5th birthday. I noticed on description it suggested ages 3-5 so I was concerned it would be too young for him...but it wasn’t! He loves it and was so excited to get it. Nice quality. Good large size toy.
customer_reviews.author: NJsNana

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for my Paw Patrol obsessed guy
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for my Paw Patrol obsessed guy. He loves that it can be a boat or a truck. And the ”bouy blasters”. He asked me track down the action figure character Wally to play more sea scenes — and those are NOT cheap anymore. Wish they would rerelease some old or make new ones with other characters
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 4 year old. He was very excited to get this and plays with it all the time. Seems well built and durable. Depending on the position the wheels are in, it makes different sounds which is kinda cool. The top portion slides easily. My son did have a little trouble with it but he was fine once he got use to it and seen how it works. If you have a little one that loves Paw Patrol I’m sure they will enjoy this Sea Patroller.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: This really is a neat toy if you can get for a decent price. I got it as a warehouse deal so feel I got for a good price. The boat bounces up and down with the wheels down. The top moves back and forth. My kids use it for all kinds of different play. Built pretty good so hard to wreck it.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! It’s very durable, and extremely fun. Has lots of different gadgets. It is huge and a little pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Very durable and my kids have had a ton of fun playing with it. Only bad thing is they have gotten their fingers caught a few times in the sliding top. They learned quickly how to avoid that but it’d be nice if the manufacturers could find a way to fix that? Either way my boys love it & were overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Fun - Much Played With - Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He loves Paw Patrol and requested the Sea Patroller. He was thrilled with the toy and has spent many hours playing with it. This is a sturdy fun toy that lends itself to imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: BJ2G

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read measurements before I purchased. I imagined a small toy and when I received it in the mail IT WAS BIG. It was a gift and the kid absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this boar. Downfall is how expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this boar. Downfall is how expensive it really is for not really being much of anything, but i know that’s probably due to the brand. Also hard for kids to grasp a boat bot being able to go in the water, otherwise, my 4 year old son loves the sounds and pushing it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but could need some work on the wheels
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids who like paw patrol, the wheels don’t pop out smoothly, other wise great toy
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this no float boat wet!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves the Sea Patrolled. He got it for his 5th birthday and played with it every day (4) then today brought it in the bath. It does not float. Yup it's a boat that doesn't float. The lights and sounds also no longer work. What kind of boat doesn't float and can't get wet?
customer_reviews.author: Richard R bugbee

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loved that boat more than he loves paw trolls and he is crazy about having this boat and he is so fascinated that he does not stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big sturdy toy, it was bigger than I anticipated and makes me feel like it was a good deal for the price. I won’t know until Christmas how well our 2 year old likes it. But i think it’s a toy that’s going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mabry

customer_reviews.title: My son looooooooves his paw patroller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he wants us to take it everywhere. Don't take it to the beach though, sand will cause the wheels to jam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with a pup
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and it has held up great with daily play. My only issue is that to really play fully with it you need to purchase the pups and their vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm so thankful to have found this on sale! My 4 year old was so thrilled to add this to his collection of Paw Patrol toys. Only complaint, fingers get pinched easily when transforming from land vehicle to boat.
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: The sound doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer stated, the sound doesn't work on the Sea Patroller I purchased. I bought new batteries thinking the ones that came with it we're worn out, but soon realized that the sound will only work if you hold down the battery compartment (very firmly) and sound button simultaneously--something my almost 3 year old can't do. She is very disappointed but we cannot return. Otherwise the toy has many pluses, but to see my daughter continually push the button in hopes of hearing a sound is sad to watch.
customer_reviews.author: H. R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his toy! It's a bit bulky but worth the space it takes up because of all the fun. All the characters fit on the boat and it is lightweight making clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdplacemom

customer_reviews.title: We Love Paw Patrol
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this boat needs is more accessories, the kids love it and play with it often. I got it from Amazon because it was a fraction of the price and that enabled me to buy more Paw Patrol. This toy is best with other Paw Patrol Toys.
customer_reviews.author: Mastermind Expert Coach Jenny Hansen Lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 and 1
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected . Perfect for my 4 and 1.5 year old. It was on the top of their Christmas list and I'm happy with my purchase. I shopped around and at the time this was the cheapest price for this toy at the time I bought it. Kids love it and we spend a lot of time playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not easily break!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed! My kids are 3 and 1 and are in love with the paw patrol! It was hard to spend so much money but it was def worth it I feel like mom of the year :) To answer the most important question no this toy is not flimsy and will hold up against toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas for my grandson. The wheels do not work frequently and the sound and lights do not work. We put new batteries in, but unless someone is pressing down on the battery compartment the sounds and lights do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Best price and super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted this for last Christmas, found at an unbeatable price, authentic and full of features for under $30.00. My kid still loves ‘till this day.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Velez

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it!! He has the extra little people to play with and is so imaginative with his "rescue missions"! Grammy was a hit on Christmas Day! This boat is bigger than i thought so i wish it came with more action pieces. Either way, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut100

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My twin 4 year olds LOVE Paw Patrol, and therefore LOVE this Sea Patroller! I was lucky enough to get an Amazon Warehouse Deal on this, the box was damaged but the toy was not, and they were true to their word!
customer_reviews.author: uscgwife

customer_reviews.title: But it has a few things that are sold separately like sky's helicopter and another character and a boat
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. But it has a few things that are sold separately like sky's helicopter and another character and a boat.. other than that it's a hit.. but now he wants the other pieces too.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: For a kid mad about PP this is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Grandson for Christmas and first thing he did was take out his other PP characters and put them in the storage area under the deck. He enjoys watching the videos and playing with this at the same time. He is 3 and mad about PP
customer_reviews.author: Miladyk

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old son received an Amazon giftcard for his birthday from my Mom, and I let him choose what he wanted. He had been wanting this, and was so happy he was able to get one! He LOVES how it "transforms". Even my 3yr old loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavier weight
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and heavier weight, this was a great toy for my son. You can pop it down to cover the wheels or push on it again for it to pop back up and utilize the wheels. Comes with Ryder and his vehicle. This has led to hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers love pretending and rescuing with the sea patrol.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and both 3 year old grandson and granddaughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sears

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It was the only thing he asked for for his birthday and six months later, he still plays with it often.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a birthday present for our 6yr old and he couldn’t be more happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: A must for all paw patrol lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter who is 3, has yet to stop playing with this toy woth her other figureine patrollers. It’s a great addition or our little girls imaginative play sets.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but boring
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy but it unfortunately didn’t hold my sons attention so it’s become a dust collector. But its a cool toy. It rolls and is a boat so if your kid is into stuff like that they will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for Paw Patrol fans
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing my daughter didn't like about this toy. She really liked the crane and her little sister loves the buoy launcher. It's expensive for a toy, but a great value for the money. She saved her allowance for almost two months to buy it. 😉
customer_reviews.author: JGinMD

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift for any child who loves paw patrol.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew's 4th birthday and I found out he loved Paw Patrol and has most of the toys. Needless to say when he opened his present, he damn near jumped out of his shoes in joy and hugged me. I will be getting my hands on more of the toys.
customer_reviews.author: KRGraphics

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loved this toy! I am so happy when I got it on sale! It is perfect for any kid who loves paw patrol
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be like any other toy he has that he plays with ...
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old wanted this for such a long time and I finally bought it for his third birthday. I thought it would be like any other toy he has that he plays with one and doesn’t touch again but he has not stop playing with this. Great purchase and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! I would give it more stars if I could! My son loves it and all the sounds. Definitely a must have for the paw patrol lover.
customer_reviews.author: Danni1226

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old nephew loved this Christmas present. Little did I know when I bought it that Paw Patrol was the current thing for that age group. The boat is very large and easy to handle with little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlady

customer_reviews.title: SON LOVES HIS XMAS GIFT! IT GOES WITH HIS ...
customer_reviews.text: SON LOVES HIS XMAS GIFT! IT GOES WITH HIS OTHER PAW PATROL COLLECTION. LIGHTS AND SOUNDS WORK AND NOT TOO LOUD EITHER. WISH IT WOULD WORK ON WATER BUT IT DOESN'T FLOAT WHICH IS WHY I COULDN'T GIVE IT 5 STARS.
customer_reviews.author: riley's mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. My 5 year old was SO happy! Much bigger than I thought it was going to be, which was an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: This Paw Patrol ship is great and my grandsons love it
customer_reviews.text: This Paw Patrol ship is great and my grandsons love it. Rescuing the little trapped animal and all the bells and whistles keep them busy for quite awhile. They seem to love it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter been wanting this for christmas.so she will be surprised when she gets this. She loves paw patrol. It's all she talks abouts.this will add to her already growing toys and stuff of paw patrol.
customer_reviews.author: arnold

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it! I love that it has cool features and it seems well made and durable, which is very important.
customer_reviews.author: True-to-life

customer_reviews.title: Fun Creative Play
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 4 year old grandsons love this toy. It transforms from a boat to a car easily.... which gives lots of created play time.
customer_reviews.author: D.Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it, gave it 4 stars, because ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it , gave it 4 stars , because I think it’s pricey and she wants to put in the water but it doesn’t float , she loves all paw patrol toys
customer_reviews.author: Diana Berker

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old grandson has been playing with it for weeks
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson asked for this toy and I'm glad I listened to him. He loves it. Great creative play.
customer_reviews.author: Billing Exec

customer_reviews.title: Grandson saw on tv and wanted it for BD good quality but he seemed to get tired of it ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson saw on tv and wanted it for BD good quality but he seemed to get tired of it quickly and does not play with it any more. was expensive for him to only play with for a day or two !
customer_reviews.author: R & R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall is a great toy, good size and works well. My kid loves it. Doesn't fit all patrol cars, you should buy the smaller versions. To get the wheels in and out may be hard for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Patty S.S.

customer_reviews.title: I see why it’s toy if the year....
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a small boat my son could play with in the bath tub... nope, the thing is massive! Son loves it, it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: eh, not impressed.  Neither were the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I am not super impressed. When filled with vehicles the springs on the wheels are not stiff enough to keep it standing on the wheels. My kids played with it at first but moved on
customer_reviews.author: Tony in NY

customer_reviews.title: He was disappointed that he couldn't put it in the bathtub but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what he asked for from Santa. He was disappointed that he couldn't put it in the bathtub but he quickly got over that. Perfect gift for a Paw Patrol fan that has everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. My child loves this and it comes with extras and it is very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old son loves this. Is big and good quality.. I'd give it a 5 but I think it was a little too pricey
customer_reviews.author: Box

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was excited to receive this for christmas. It was at a discount price and its a good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Vkain

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy - but doesn’t keep kid’s attention long.
customer_reviews.text: It’s well made and as good as can be expected but my kid lost interest in it after a few weeks and hasn’t played with it since.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: The toy is pretty neat. Beware, it does *not* come with any pups. Only Ryder. It makes some noises, and the wheels lower and raise and has a hatch to allow vehicles to go in and out of. Despite appearing plastic-y it's held up well to lots of play.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol Fun
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for any Paw Patrol lover. Good quality, durability and hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew and it was one of his favorite presents. He played with it for the whole day and was still playing with it a week later when I came back.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this toy. It fits the little paw patrol cars he has nicely. It is a lot bigger than it looks in the pictures, which was a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mortifi

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty fun toy for the PawPatrol lovers! Lots of fun surprises with this one. Kids love it and it's pretty sturdy. Watch the fingers when sliding the top piece across though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toy, my sone got for his 5th birthday and absolutely loves it! And it was $18 cheaper on Amazon than at WalMart!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Santa gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with this! This was the top of his list and he was ecstatic to receive it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Like some others have said, this toy is bigger than it looks in the listing. Very sturdy. This is a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: SOUTHERLAND

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy and I love the pieces that came with it since individual paw patrol pieces are super expensive. Arrived fast and was cheaper than in the stores!
customer_reviews.author: Lopez913

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome. My son loves it. Just like buying off the shelf of a store. Sturdy, came with all pieces, nothing broke. Thank you for making my sons christmas awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Biggest hit for Christmas with grandson
customer_reviews.text: Loved this!! Grandson couldn't put it down. Great quality, price, and so far has provided hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Handel

customer_reviews.title: Fun and well built
customer_reviews.text: High quality and fun toy. The tabsofrmation from boat to truck works great and the kids love it. Sturdily built and durable. Would be nice if it came with characters.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my toddler. He is an avid Paw Patrol fan, and also loves boats. This toy is better quality than I expected, and has a lot of play features. My only gripe is that the rolling feature only works half the time. This set includes the Ryder figure, which is a nice change from the usual Marshall or Chase.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: The child that received this from Santa is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: The child that received this from Santa is in love with it, takes it everywhere with him. I am very pleased even though it was somewhat overpriced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for my paw patrol lover great addition to his ever growing collection
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive for what it is but Paw Patrol is cocaine for children so they know it and charge accordingly. Good quality toy...built well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler grandson has had this for a few months, and it has held up well. It rolls easily on various floor surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Ddmcs4816

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a hit, great fun for my boys (2.5, 4.5) and lots of fun ways to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: HD4386

product_meta.title: PAW Patrol Sea Patrol - Sea Patroller Transforming Vehicle with Lights & Sounds, Ages 3 & Up
product_meta.description: Style:Standard PackagingTrouble is on the horizon at Adventure Beach! Help Ryder save Baby Octopus by jumping aboard the Paw Patrol Sea Patroller. Equipped with flashing lights, sounds and a detachable anchor, this rescue vehicle comes with everything you need to sail the high seas. As captain, you’ll have command of the lifesaver launcher, as well as the handy crane and cage – perfect for getting Ryder into hard-to-reach places. This dual boat/ land vehicle can easily tackle rocky roads. Simply slide the bridge forward and wheels drop down, taking you over any terrain. There’s room for all Paw Patrol figures aboard the Sea Patroller (additional figures sold separately). This ship can hold up to 2 vehicles, and comes with Ryder’s Rescue ATV. Load it into the Sea Patroller and use the front-opening ramp to send the Paw Patrol on a roll! For extra-tricky missions that require flight, the helipad on the back of the ship is the perfect launching spot for Skye (sold separately). Whether land, sea or air, the Paw Patrol will be there!
feature_bullets: FROM LAND TO SEA & BACK: The Sea Patroller uses drop-down wheels to transform from ship to land vehicle and back, to take pups on new and exciting missions (The Sea Patroller is equipped to sail the imaginary ocean, but cannot be submerged in water)

RESCUE READY: Lift Ryder out of sticky situations with the moveable crane & attachable cage, send him down the ramp with his Rescue ATV, use flashing lights & sounds to keep Adventure Beach safe, & the lifesaver launcher to rescue anyone in distress

PLUCKY PUPS: The pups of PAW Patrol are rescue dogs in training, inspired by real-world jobs like firefighter, police officer & construction worker When trouble strikes they're there to save the day, whether it's a cat in a tree or a train off the tracks

LEARNING MADE FUN: PAW Patrol is a fun way to learn bravery & heroism, with exciting stories that never get too scary PAW Patrol figures and playsets put your child ages 3 and up in charge of the action for hours of interactive & fun-filled adventure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
